item.title: File Transfer Protocol (FTP)
item.description: General Create an active connection ftp $ip Create a passive connection (If you canâ€™t see files it may help) ftp -p $ip List all files ls -lah Download multiple files prompt mget * Download all files using wget wget -r ftp://$user:$password@$ip/ View the directory contents with curl curl -s -v 'ftp://$user:$password@$ip/' View directory contents with curl in passive mode curl -s -v -P - 'ftp://$user:$password@$ip/' Upload a file with curl

item.title: Server Message Block (SMB)
item.description: Initial Scans Netbios scan nbtscan -r $ip Enumerate host name nmblookup -A $ip List Shares #1 (specifying guest account) smbmap -H $ip -u guest List Shares #2 smbclient -L \\$ip List Shares #3 crackmapexec smb $ip --shares List Shares with credentials smbmap -u $user -p $password -R -H $ip Exhaustive Scan enum4linux -a -M -l -d $ip Check Null Sessions smbmap -H $ip Check Null Sessions
